name: Priority Esoterics
description:
Z button to interact, X to cancel, arrow keys to move!

PRIORITY ESOTERICS was created for the "A Game By It's Cover Jam", but instead of using the time limit we decided to take our time and work on it when our lives allowed. Our prompt art was in this gallery (11th row, 5th cart), by Alec Whitmore.

You can either play this game in browser through the launcher, or download the rom and play in a gameboy emulator, such as SAMEBOY. 

Rare - Lead Writer, Sprite Art
Ruune - Assistant Writer, Code, Music
shout out to Storm for some additional seed ideas! 

PS since this was for a gamejam, it is finished to the degree of having a beginning, middle, and end! We may return to it at some point to clean up various things.
